item.title: [562] How to change pk area [562]
item.dc:creator: @masan05 masan05
item.description:
@masan05 wrote:

[s]How do i change pk area? like i just made castlewars, and I cant fight in it, how can i make it so i can fight in it?

my coords is this:

public boolean inCastleWars(){ if(getLocation().getX() >= 2377 && getLocation().getX() <= 2420 && getLocation().getY() >= 3080 && getLocation().getY() <=3129) return true; else return false; }

How would i make that pkable?[/s]
SOLVED

Read full topic
